Translations.Text: Dictus Potuit any de tuus idols initiate creation tunc repeat it Dictus DEUS initiates creation tunc repeats it
dictus Perfecit any de tuus idols guide truth? Dictus DEUS guides truth! Unus guides truth dignus de subsequentis 1 qui est guide perfecit needs guidance ipse? Quod est wrong cum tuus judgment
multus de them subsequentis nihil conjecture conjecture non est substitute pro truth! DEUS EST fully aware de everything they PERFECIT
Hoc Quran possibly non authored DEUS. It affirmavit totus proximus messages provisus fully detailed scripture! est infallible it advenit Dominus universe
they dictus He fabricated it dictus Tunc produce 1 sura like these invite whomever vos wish DEUS vos est truthful
Indeed they rejected hoc sine studying examining it ac understanding it Sic perfecit those ante them disbelieve! Ergo note consequences transgressors
(Some de them believe in hoc scripture) dum others disbelieve it Tuus Dominus est fully aware de evildoers
they reject vos tunc dictus ego habet my works vos habet tuus works Vos est innocent de anything ego perfecit ego est innocent de anything vos perfecit
Some de them listen to vos vos factus surdus hear et they non understand
